title: How to turn off airplane mode without unlocking Pixel 2? Possibly with power and volume buttons.
content:
My Pixel 2 do not recognize my PIN. I need to reset it.
Separate thread on this: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/66639588?hl=en

After my Pixel2 forgotten my PIN, I turned on airplane mode, possibly with power and volume buttons.
It prevents the phone from making backup of my precious photos and endomondo tracks.

Anyone know how to turn it off?
